# AVMIDIMetaEvent

**Class**

An object that represents MIDI meta event messages.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMIDIMetaEvent
```

## Overview

You can’t modify the size and contents of this event once you create it. This doesn’t verify that the content matches the MIDI specification.

You can only add [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIMetaEvent/EventType/tempo], [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIMetaEvent/EventType/smpteOffset], or [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIMetaEvent/EventType/timeSignature] to a sequence’s tempo track.

## Creating a Meta Event

- **init(type:data:)**: Creates an event with a MIDI meta event type and data.

## Getting the Meta Event Type

- **type**: The type of meta event.
- **AVMIDIMetaEvent.EventType**: Constants that represent the types of meta events.

## Handling MIDI Events

- **AVMIDINoteEvent**: An object that represents MIDI note on or off messages.
- **AVMIDISysexEvent**: An object that represents a MIDI system exclusive message.

## Inherits From

- AVMusicEvent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
